name: SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Geofuture Te Mihi Unit 3 Steamfield. Structural Specifications - 5.1.4
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Each Mix Design used prior to use

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Cement shall be ordinary Portland Cement, complying with NZS 3122. All aggregates shall comply with NZS 3121, is not derived from Andesite rock and does not exceed 20mm. Chloride content shall not exceed 0.8kg/m3 as per NZS3109. Mix designs shall comply with the table located on page 37 of the specification
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Geofuture Te Mihi Unit 3 Steamfield. Structural Specifications - 6.1.7
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to manufacturing of reinforcing

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Reinforcement shall be hot rolled steel bars, Class E complying with AS/NZS 4671 . Reinforcing shall be manufactured by micro alloy techniques. Reinforcing shall be indentified along its length with its strength grades, ductility class, steel producer and method of manufacture.
Cast in Items - Nuts, Bolts and Studs
SPECIFICATION REFERENCE - Geofuture Te Mihi Unit 3 Steamfield. Structural Specifications - 16.2.4
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to Ordering
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Bolts, Nuts and Washers shall comply with NZS3404. All bolts, Nuts and wahsers shall be hot dip galvanised complying with AS 1214.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing site concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Subgrade to be trimmed within +10/-50mm of the bottom of site concrete level.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Each Foundation
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Site concrete to be placed at the thicknesses shown on the drawings and finished to a height of +/- 10mm
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Each Foundation
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Foundations and embedded items shall be setout following the tolerances, heights and positions shown in each foundations respective drawing.
TEST REQUIRED - Pre pour inspection sheet
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Prior to placing structural concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Pre pour inspection sheet to be completed prior to placing concrete. WCL to be notified of pours for inspection at least 24 hours prior to placing concrete.
TEST REQUIRED - Post pour inspection sheet
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - Following placement of concrete
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Post pour inspection sheet to be completed following each pour.
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - For Each Foundation
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Confirmation From Engineer on as built records & redline mark ups
Completion Inspection inc. Construction Defects Report
TEST REQUIRED - Completion inspection on each foundation by CEL
TASK TIMING OR TASK FREQUENCY - For Each Foundation
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Provided a completed construction defect report that that details any remedial measures taken, & snag lists closed out
